DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate substantial equivalence investigational contact lens disinfect solution commercially available contact lens solution gas permeable lens wearer .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Evaluation New Contact Lens Disinfecting Solution Gas Permeable Contact Lens Wearers
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects normal eye ( correction refractive error ) successfully wear silicone acrylate fluoro silicone acrylate gas permeable contact lenses randomize 2:1 receive either investigational commercial contact lens solution daily use throughout study ( 90 day ) .
DOC.criteria: Normal eye ( correction visual acuity ) ; Successful history gas permeable contact lens wear eye one two brand : Boston XO Boston II ; Best spectacle correct distance visual acuity great equal 20/25 eye ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Any ocular systemic medical condition may , opinion investigator , preclude safe administration investigational product affect result study ; Need wear contact lens extend wear basis ( ie , overnight ) study ; Use daily cleaner and/or enzyme clean care lenses least 7 day prior Visit 1 ; History intolerance hypersensitivity component investigational product ; Use overthecounter ( OTC ) prescribe topical ocular medication within 7 day prior Visit 1 ; Moderate , severe , abnormal , ocular finding ; Current history ocular infection , severe inflammation , disease within 6 month prior Visit 1 ; Any systemic disease Visit 1 ( include allergy , respiratory infection cold ) may affect eye exacerbate use contact lenses contact lens solution ; Use systemic medication may contribute adverse ocular effect unless stable dose regimen ; Ocular surgery within last 12 month ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
